name: Fifteen
description:
We’re an award winning brand and digital agency with offices in Nottingham and London. At fifteen years old, our Managing Director, Ollie Piddubriwnyj, designed his first project for Notts County FC – that’s where our story begins. Our client base now spans a broad range of industry sectors in the UK, Asia and America all with one thing in common: the desire to continuously grow their businesses or organisations.
Our bespoke creative solutions – web design, development, digital marketing, branding and print based design services – help them achieve just that.
READ MORE...
